scripts.coverage: npm run coverage_test && npm run coverage_report
scripts.testall: cd && npm run fix && npm run test && cd
scripts.commit: cd && git add . && git commit -a -m "config updates" && cd
scripts.commitFast: cd && npm run line && npm run commit && npm run push && git status && cd
scripts.commitAll: npm run yarn2 && npm run fix && npm run commit && npm test && npm run push
scripts.commitfix: npm run testall && cd && git add . && git commit -a -m "Bug fixes" && cd
scripts.commitnew: npm run testall && cd && git add . && git commit -a -m "Added new features" && cd
scripts.git: cd && git add . && git commit -a -m "sync changes" && cd
scripts.gitfix: npm run commitfix && npm run v_patch && npm run push
scripts.gitnew: npm run commitnew && npm run v_minor && npm run push
scripts.push: npm run line && echo PUSH and release to MASTER... && git push origin master
scripts.release: cd && npm run fix && npm test && npm run patch && start npm run push
scripts.ncu: cd && ncu -u -l info --timeout 70000 && cd && npm run yarn2
scripts.prep: npm run fix && npm test && npm run patch
scripts.log: npm run line && git log --since=2.weeks --pretty=format:"%h - %an, %ar : %s" && git status
scripts.log2: npm run line && git --no-pager log --pretty=format:"%h - %an, %ar : %s" > log.txt && git status > log2.txt && dir log*.txt
scripts.gitfixrepo: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m ".gitignore fix"
scripts.test_yarn: npm run yarn2 && npm test && npm run fix
scripts.pull: cd && npm run line && git pull && npm run yarn2 && npm test && cd
scripts.upgrade: npm run ncu && npm run commit && npm run release && npm run line
scripts.beta: npm run commit && npm run release
scripts.gitfixrep: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m ".gitignore fix"
scripts.commitredo: npm run testall && cd && git add . && git commit -a -m "Refactor and improve code" && cd
scripts.gitredo: npm run commitredo && npm run v_patch && npm run push
scripts.global: cd && npm i -g  eslint babel-eslint codecov mocha nyc snazzy standard symlink-dir console-countdown
scripts.compiler: cd && npm i --dev webpack webpack-cli webpack-strip-block uglifyjs-webpack-plugin

about.task: see dashboards and specification of my packages
about.reason: to ensure quality and maintainability accross all projects
